name: Verify that a tire can be added to the cart when the user is logged in.
description: Verify that a success message is displayed when a logged-in user adds a tire to the cart.
descriptionHtml: Verify that a success message is displayed when a logged-in user adds a tire to the cart.

testStage.description: Verify that a success message is displayed when a logged-in user adds a tire to the cart.

steps.name: Filling the tires table with input: TiresInput(selectWidth=235, selectProfile=60, selectDiameter=16, selectProtector=RISKO, enterFirstPrice=100, enterSecondPrice=2000)

parameters.name: tiresInput
parameters.value: TiresInput(selectWidth=235, selectProfile=60, selectDiameter=16, selectProtector=RISKO, enterFirstPrice=100, enterSecondPrice=2000)

afterStages.name: tearDown
afterStages.description: Close browser after each test and take screenshot if failed
